report.title: Rit Rox
report.author: A Henderson
report.bodytext: /n /n /n I have been an IV user for a long time, maybe 3years. I have tried almost every drug there is, Ritalin, Morphine, Methadone, Methamphetamine, Benzopiperazine, Benzodiazepines, Barbiturates. /n /n Good Things: /n Ritalin is defnitely one of my personal faves. Of all the drugs I have tried, ritalin is one of the best maybe second to methamphetamine. After it is administered through a syringe and needle in the vein it puts me on an intense rush but after about 10-15mins it wears off a bit and I start clenching my jaw. I usually spend the rest of the night doing random things to pass the time. And I go to sleep the next day, and wake up feeling allryt but generally pretty shit. /n /n Bad Things: /n It makes me stay up for a very long time sometimes days. /n Fast Heart Rate /n Dialated Pupils (really obviously wasted eyes) /n Random Behavior
